::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus: This Predacon, Trelos, escaped the base and has been leading us on a chase for what seems like hours. He is armed and dangerous.

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:                                  
Windlord appeared close to Rodimus and said "What's  the situatuion here?"
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   From:    Richard    Allen 
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   Sent: Wednesday, October 17, 2007 4:03    PM
   Subject: Re: Atlantis
   

      ::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

Rodimus: This couldn't get any    easier?

Kup: Has it ever been easy, Roddy?

The two Autobots    transform to car modes and continue the chase.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...>  wrote:   
          OOC: Sorry about te delay.

BIC:

Trelos, now injured flew      into a rage. He jumped up in the air several
times, spinning in the air      each time. He then took off down the alley
and around the alley, running      east. Perseus and the troopers followed
after him. Ravenchief was unable      to follow and attempted to go around
to the other side of the      buildings.

OOC: This neighborhood is about 8 blocks x 4 blocks,      Trelos is near
the center so Doc and Ravenchief will have trouble getting      to him

On 10/10/07, Airshadow <airly2002@...>      wrote:
> Windlord:
>
> "I'm o0n the way!!!" said the male      while he tracked the signal and run in
> that way
> -----      Original Message -----
> From: Richard Allen
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>      Sent: Wednesday, October 10, 2007 9:01 AM
> Subject: Re:      Atlantis
>
>
> ::Kup::
>
> Kup chimes in on      the comm channel.
>
> Kup: Help would always be appreciated when      we're getting shot at, lad!
>
> Airshadow <airly2002@...>      wrote:
>
> Windlord:
>
> "Its all situation      undercontrol???? do you need any support?"
>
>
>      ----- Original Message -----
> From: Richard Allen
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>      Sent: Tuesday, October 09, 2007 9:43 AM
> Subject: Re:      Atlantis
>
>
> ::Rodimus Prime::
>
> Rodimus      opened a return channel to Windlord.
>
> Rodimus(via comm):      Trelos is outside of the base down the cities main
> street. We're all      currently engaged in a fire fight. Odds are in our favor
> so i think      we'll have him.
>
> xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>      wrote:
> Windlord opened his comlink and said"Lord Perseus, Rodimus...      I'm
> missing in the base, what's the situation and where is      the
> prisioner?"
>
>
